properties.Name: DC Bluegrass Union VFW Bluegrass Jam
properties.Directions: Just a few blocks from the intersection of New Hampshire Ave and Eastern Ave.
properties.Information: VFW Post 350: 301-270-8008 or email Barb Diederich at barb@barbdiederich.com

properties.Name: BrownBag Bluegrass Gospel (B3G)
properties.Venue: First Presbyterian Church of Winchester (in the Fellowship Hall)
properties.Directions: Just a few blocks from the intersection of New Hampshire Ave and Eastern Ave.
properties.Note: Bring your own brown bag lunch, your instrument, and your friends to socialize and listen to some local bluegrass gospel music. No sermons, no donations, just good fellowship and great pickin'
properties.Information: Assoc. Pastor, Dr. Dan McCoig at http://www.firstchurch-winchester.org

properties.Name: Loudon Bluegrass Association Jam
properties.Directions: Just a few blocks from the intersection of New Hampshire Ave and Eastern Ave.

properties.Name: Millcreek Bluegrass Band Jam
properties.Note: 8 miles west of West Chester, PA

properties.Name: BIG Bluegrass Jam
properties.Note: Mermaid Lane & Germantown Avenue

properties.Name: Tuesday Night Bluegrass, Old Time and Gospel Jam
properties.Address: 1760 West College Avenue, State College, PA
properties.Note: Open to the public. Everyone is welcome to join in--or just to listen. Pennsylvania's most well attended weekly bluegrass jam. A great place for beginners to get started. Music stands OK. Admission free (Donations encouraged to defray costs of utilities and coffee. Participants are encouraged to bring potluck goodies (cakes, pies, cookies, cupcakes, etc.) for the 10-15 minute break at 8:30 p.m.

properties.Name: Bluegrass Jam
properties.Note: Held at Memorial Hall (Old Harrisonburg High School). Free to the public, all level of players welcome...

properties.Name: Bluegrass Music Alliance Jam
properties.Venue: Train Station on East Martin Street
properties.Note: Musicians of all levels encouraged to come; bluegrass music fans are welcome to listen

properties.Name: Baltimore Old Time Jam
properties.Note: Slow jam from 7:00-8:00 and fast jam from 8:00-10:30

properties.Name: Elkton Bluegrass Jam
properties.Address: 20592 Blue and Gold Drive, Elkton, VA

properties.Name: Arcadia Bluegrass Jam
properties.Note: Inside the Activites Bldg at 16020 Carnival Ave off Arcadia Ave

properties.Name: Open Acoustical Mic, hosted by MT Pockets N Loose Change Pickers
properties.Note: At the intersection of OLD (biz) route 7 & route 704

properties.Name: Garry Elders open mic
properties.Address: 2259 Bel Pre Road, Silver Spring, MD 20906
properties.Note: Call for early signup

properties.Name: Bluerass Jam
properties.Note: Kitchen is Open

properties.Name: Open Jam
properties.Note: All levels welcome. Several jams at all times, spectators welcome. Snacks provided, acoustic only

properties.Name: Open Jam hosted by Kingstreet Bluegrass
properties.Venue: Fiona's Irish Pub (formerly King Street Blues)

properties.Name: Round Hill Monthly Bluegrass & Folk Jam Session
properties.Address: 6 W Loudon Street, Round Hill, VA 20141
properties.Note: Free admission. Open to all ages and skill levels. Barbecue dinner and drinks available for purchase.

properties.Name: Browntown Jam
properties.Note: Food available

properties.Name: Colonial Beach Lions Club Bluegrass Jam
properties.Address: 717 Marshall Avenue, 717 Marshall Avenue, Colonial Beach, VA 22443
properties.Note: Admission - $2.00, Dinner - $5.00 (includes desert and drink), Everyone welcome to listen or jam

properties.Name: Bluegrass, Gospel & Country Jam
properties.Days: Second and Fourth Fridays of every month
properties.Note: Admission - $4.00, All year round except December

properties.Name: Bargain Barn Bluegrass Jam
properties.Venue: The Hughesville Habitat Restore at the Bargain Barn

properties.Name: Bluegrass Jam
properties.Venue: Beck and Benedict Hardware Store and Music Shop
properties.Note: Donation $3.00, refreshment table provided, door prizes multiple jams throughout, acoustic only, all level musicians welcome, spectators welcome. ok to perform on stage.

properties.Name: Kingstowne Acoustic Music Bluegrass Jam
properties.Days: First and Third Friday of every month

properties.Name: Friday Night Bluegrass Jam
properties.Note: The club is actually in Mt Pleasant, about 6 miles east of Frederick, MD on Hwy 26. Open to all levels of musicians and vocalists; acoustic instruments only; everyone gets a chance to play and/or sing. Spectators welcome. Snacks and sodas available through the Ruritan Club; asking a donation at the door to help the club defray expenses

properties.Name: Gettysburg YWCA Jam
properties.Note: Open jam, all invited. Donations taken, plenty of well-lit parking. Same area at Gettysburg College; no stage, no mics, no pressure. trending toward traditional bluegrass

properties.Name: The Spike Jam Sessions
properties.Note: Just west of the Food Lion Shopping Center

properties.Name: Vienna Maple Avenue Market Bluegrass Jam
properties.Days: Second and fourth Friday of every month
